title: Gokupuri: Gokudou no Ouji-sama
original_name: ゴクプリ～極道の王子様～
sinopse:
A collection of one shots.

1. Gokudou no Oujisama (Gokupuri - The Hoodlem Prince)
2. Oujisama no Kaikata (Raising a Prince)
3. Bishounen Shichihenge
4. Pet Katte Mimasen ka? (Won't you try to raise my pet?)
5. Motto Kikasete... (Let me ask more...)

(Source: MU)
